author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Place chillies in a roasting tray and roast at 220C/425F/Gas 7 for 10-15 minutes, depending on the size of chillies.   They should be blackened on the outside and soft to the touch.   Remove any black skin from the chillies and pass through a fine sieve.  Fold together with the tomatoes, garlic, onion, and cumin.
